Or use /start to return to main menu.

ğŸ¨ **Free Generation**

Send me your text prompt, or:
free_generation.prompt_too_short: âŒ Prompt is too short. Please provide a more detailed description (at least 3 characters).
free_generation.generating:
ğŸ¨ Generating image with **{style}** style...

This may take 30-60 seconds. Please wait.
free_generation.guide_body:
A good prompt includes:

1. **Subject** - Who or what (person, object, scene)
2. **Action/Pose** - What they're doing
3. **Location** - Where (beach, city, room, forest)
4. **Atmosphere** - Mood and style (cinematic, dreamy, dramatic)
5. **Details** - Clothing, lighting, camera angle, colors
free_generation.guide_tip: Be specific and descriptive for best results!
free_generation.example_1: Portrait of elegant woman in 1940s style, dramatic shadows, black and white, film noir aesthetic, vintage photography
free_generation.example_2: Cyberpunk street scene at night, neon signs reflecting in rain, futuristic cityscape, atmospheric fog, cinematic composition
free_generation.example_3: Anime girl with long blue hair, school uniform, cherry blossoms falling, soft pastel colors, detailed anime art style
free_generation.example_4: Professional portrait photography, natural daylight, shallow depth of field, 35mm lens, realistic skin texture, soft bokeh background
free_generation.example_5: Ethereal fantasy portrait, magical forest background, soft glowing lights, mystical atmosphere, dreamy composition

ğŸ’¡ Guide | ğŸ“‹ Templates
nsfw_face.guide_body:
Your face will be used automatically - no need to describe facial features.

**Describe:**
1. **Body pose** and position (sitting, standing, lying)
2. **Location** and setting (bedroom, studio, luxury hotel)
3. **Clothing/appearance** (tasteful descriptions)
4. **Lighting** and atmosphere (soft, romantic, dramatic)
5. **Artistic style** (cinematic, noir, realistic)

**Example:**
_"Female figure in soft lighting, sitting on bed edge, luxury bedroom, romantic atmosphere, cinematic style"_

ğŸ’« Focus on composition and mood for artistic results!

help.title:
ğŸ†˜ **Need Help?**

Here you will find answers to popular questions and solutions to problems.

Select a section:
help.generation_problems_content:
**Having problems with generation? Let's figure it out!**

â€¢ **1. Button not working:** If the "Generate" button doesn't react, you might be using an outdated version of the menu. Just press /start to update the menu.

â€¢ **2. No result:** If the bot writes "started generation," but nothing happens, it means Telegram deleted the original photo from the cache. Please send the photo again and everything will work.

If the problem persists, contact technical support.
help.payment_problems_content:
**Having problems with payment?**

â€¢ **1. Payment not credited:**
  - Wait 3 minutes, sometimes payments are delayed.
  - When paying with cryptocurrency, the waiting time is up to 10 minutes.
  - If the payment is not credited, contact technical support.

â€¢ **2. Payment page does not open:**
  - In some regions, it only works with VPN. Turn on VPN and try again.

If there is another problem - contact technical support.
help.tech_support_content:
**Technical Support**

If you have problems that cannot be solved through the help section, contact technical support.

Our team will help you solve any questions!
help.prompt_guide_content:
A good prompt includes:

1. **Subject** - Who or what
2. **Action/Pose** - What they're doing
3. **Location** - Where it happens
4. **Atmosphere** - Mood
5. **Details** - Clothing, lighting, colors

âœ¨ Be specific and descriptive!
help.style_guide_content:
**Available Styles:**

ğŸ¬ **Noir** - Cinematic black and white style
ğŸ“¸ **Super Realism** - Maximum realistic
âœ¨ **Anime** - Anime style
ğŸ“¸ **Realism** - Photorealism
âœ¨ **Lux** - Luxury style
ğŸ¤– **ChatGPT** - Universal style
help.limitations_content:
**Limitations:**

â€¢ Maximum photo size: 10 MB
â€¢ Minimum resolution: 512x512
â€¢ Formats: JPG, PNG
â€¢ Maximum 5 face photos
â€¢ Generation may take 30-120 seconds
help.face_improvement_content:
**Tips for Better Face Results:**

âœ… Clear frontal photos
âœ… Good lighting
âœ… High quality
âœ… Multiple photos (1-5) for better accuracy
âœ… Avoid photos with sunglasses or covered face
help.prohibited_content:
**Prohibited:**

âŒ Generating illegal content
âŒ Using others' photos without permission
âŒ Spam and abuse
âŒ Copyright violation

âš ï¸ Bot is for legal use only.
